title: Potions
content: . Potion of Gaseous Form Transform into a cloud of mist. You become resistant to non-magical damage, gain Advantage on Constitution/Dexterity/ Strength Save, and become tiny. You can't attack, cast spells, or talk. Consuming this potion feels more like swallowing vapour than liquid. Potion of Mind Reading Drink to probe into the minds of those around you. You will be able to read the thoughts of certain creatures while speaking with them. Fragments of memory and perception smatter this liquid -
